QuestData.Title: A Witness to History
QuestData.Description: The celestials are allowing us back into the Vale! This will be a sight to behold.$b$bWe shouldn't waste any time. Head to the Gate of the August Celestials at the southern edge of Kun-Lai Summit and speak with me there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Anduin Wrynn at the Gate of the August Celestials.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to the Shrine of Seven Stars.$B$BI wish I could bring you better tidings, $c, but the situation here in the Vale is quite dire.$B$BThere is much to do, but first, rest and explore the city.$B$BWelcome to the Vale.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Anduin at the Gate of the August Celestials
